text: We present work in progress on the problem of learning from labeled and unlabeled data .Following the approach of Blum and Chawla ( 2001 ) we consider algorithms that use pairwise relationships among examples ( both labeled and unlabeled ) in order to construct a graph that can then be partitioned using a mincut algorithm .
